DOC.detailed_description: OUTLINE : This multi-center study . This pilot study design determine safety feasibility treatment dasatinib 100 mg administer orally daily 4 week duration prior radical cystectomy patient muscle-invasive transitional cell carcinoma bladder ineligible and/or willing forgo neoadjuvant cisplatin-based combination chemotherapy . If surgery delay imperative , dasatinib therapy continue least 24 hour plan surgery .
